content: औपसर्गिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ उपसर्गठञ्] {@--1@} Able to cope with adversity. {@--2@} Portentous. {@--3@} Relating to change &c. {@--4@} Superinduced (as a disease). {@--5@} Connected with a preposition. --कः Irregular action of the humours of the body, producing cold sweats &c. (वातादिसन्निपात).
